1. Understand YourÂ Space

â€œIf you are going to dedicate five to seven years of your life in a company, donâ€™t do it based on some tech article you read. 9. Make the Impossible Possible

10. Donâ€™t Focus on YourÂ Product

â€œFor each investment, I look at three things in the following order:

Peopleâ€Šâ€”â€ŠWhat is the team and what have they done? How have their careers progressed to the point where they are now uniquely qualified to build this business together today? Ultimately, world class founders build world class businesses.

Marketâ€Šâ€”â€ŠIâ€™m looking for entrepreneurs who are looking to build a business in a massive market.
